title: Bourride of pollock and mussels with garlic and thyme croûtons
description: Give a fish stew a makeover from Marseille. This one with inexpensive pollock and mussels tastes completely luxurious with its homemade aïoli.Equipment: You will need a food processor or blender
ingredients: 2 large free-range egg yolks (at room temperature)
1 small garlic clove, finely chopped or crushed to a paste
12-16 large mussels, scrubbed well and beards removed
1 red bird’s-eye chilli, seeds removed and finely chopped
½ orange, finely grated zest only
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
